sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均含"结婚"之意。
means: wedding ： 普通用词，指婚礼上的结婚仪式以及随之而来的庆祝活动。
marriage ： 普通用词，含义广，指婚烟关系及婚后生活，也可指结婚仪式。

sentence.Network_en: After a three-weekend courtship, Pamela accepted Randolph's proposal of marriage.
sentence.Network_cn: 经过3个周末的追求之后，帕梅拉接受了伦道夫的求婚。

sentence.Network_en: After sixteen years of marriage they have grown bored with each other.
sentence.Network_cn: 结婚16年后，他们已经渐渐彼此厌倦了。

sentence.Network_en: Mr Olaechea has British residency by virtue of his marriage.
sentence.Network_cn: 奥拉伊奇先生通过结婚而取得在英国的永久居留权。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 花语_互动百科 ... 恶作剧（ Mischief） 婚姻（marriage）（ Marriage） 正义感（ Heroism）.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... market n. 市场，集市 marriage n. 结婚，婚姻 married a. 已婚的.
M开头的英语四级词汇_百度文库 ... market n. 市场；集市；销路 marriage n. 结婚，婚姻；婚礼 married a. 已婚的；婚姻的.
婚_百度百科 ... 婚假〖 weddingleave〗 婚嫁〖 marriage;wedding〗 婚礼〖 weddingceremony〗.

list.abs: 高洁英语吧 - 博客大巴 ... Wedding march 婚礼进行曲 Mixed marriage 涉外婚姻；跨国婚姻 Paper wedding 纸婚一周年.
法律词汇_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... 婚姻登记所 Marriage Registration Office 婚姻法 marriage law 婚姻基础 basis for marriage.
快乐婚礼(happy marriage)「已完结」开心鼠「更至第13回」 空手小霸王「更至第40卷」 恐龙牙医「已完结」 苦涩的甜蜜「已完结」 …
高洁英语吧 - 博客大巴 ... Wed in a civil ceremony 登记结婚 Marriage certificate 结婚证 Guest 来宾.

jx.jx_en_mean: as a result of a marriage
jx.jx_cn_mean: 通过婚姻（而形成或得到）

lj.lj_ly: the estate passed by marriage to the Burlingtons.
lj.lj_ls: 通过婚姻财产传给了伯林顿家族。

lj.lj_ly: he asked my father for my &B{hand in marriage}.
lj.lj_ls: 他请求我父亲把我嫁给他。

jx.jx_en_mean: a marriage concluded to achieve a practical purpose
jx.jx_cn_mean: 满足相互利益的结合，权宜婚姻

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French mariage, from marier 'marry'

entry.def: A marriage is the relationship between a husband and wife.

example.ex: In a good marriage, both husband and wife work hard to solve any problems that arise...
example.tran: 美满的婚姻中，夫妻双方会共同努力去解决出现的任何问题。

example.ex: When I was 35 my marriage broke up...

entry.def: A marriage is the act of marrying someone, or the ceremony at which this is done.

example.ex: I opposed her marriage to Darryl.

entry.def: Marriage is the state of being married.

example.ex: In twenty years of marriage he has only taken two proper vacations.
example.tran: 结婚二十年里，他只像样地度过两次假。

means.word_mean: 1. the state of being a married couple voluntarily joined for life (or until divorce);
2. two people who are married to each other;

sentences.sentence: "his second marriage was happier than the first"

means.word_mean: 3. the act of marrying; the nuptial ceremony;

sentences.sentence: "their marriage was conducted in the chapel"

auth_sentence.content: 'S musical marriage of the twee and the dramatic.
auth_sentence.res_content: 'S musical marriage of the twee and the dramatic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: 'S musical marriage of the twee and the dramatic.

auth_sentence.content: What does the marriage of these two elements produce?
auth_sentence.res_content: What does the marriage of these two elements produce?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What does the marriage of these two elements produce?

auth_sentence.content: There was talk of marriage, her mother said.
auth_sentence.res_content: There was talk of marriage, her mother said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There was talk of marriage, her mother said.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 名词或动词后缀,表示"状态,总称"; 2. [做的]状态,过程; 3. 名词后缀,表示"费用"; 4. 名词后缀,表示"场所,物品"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dam+age状态,总称→n.损害,伤害
carry携带,运送+age费用→carriage运费
post邮件+age费用→n.邮资
rail铁路+age费用→n.铁路运输,铁路运费
tow拖+age费用→n.拖[船,车]费
water水+age费用→n.水路运输,水运费
anchor铁锚+age场所,物品→n.停泊地点;抛锚地点
append附加+age表示名词→n.附加物
bever饮,喝+age场所,物品→n.[水,酒等之外的]饮料
cot小床,小屋+age场所→cottage村舍,小屋
herit继承+age场所,物品→n.遗产,继承物;传统
hermit隐居士+age场所,物品→n.隐居处
lug拖拉+age物品→需要拖运的物品→luggage行李,皮箱
vill茅屋+age场所,物品→n.村,村庄
wreck残骸+age场所,物品→n.残骸,碎片

stems_affixes.value_cn: 优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad+vant=van前卫,先锋+age状态,总称→n.优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
dot打点,打盹+age状态,总称→n.老年糊涂,溺爱
drain排干+age状态,总称→n.排水;下水道
foli叶+age状态,总称→n.叶子[总称]
marry结婚+age状态,总称→marriage
mile英里+age状态,总称→n.里程
patron赞助人+age状态,总称→n.赞助,惠顾
percent百分比+age状态,总称→n.百分率
pilgrim朝圣+age状态,总称→n.朝圣
short短+age状态,总称→n.不足,缺乏
ton吨+age状态,总称→tonnage吨位
verbi=verb词语+age状态,总称→词的状态→冗长
vis看+age状态,总称→n.脸,面貌
pill抢夺+age状态,总称→n.&v.抢劫,掠夺
en进入+vis看+age[做的]状态→进入看的状态

Sentence.sentence: The old stereotypes of men's and women's work have been changing more quickly than ever before, except perhaps in my own marriage.

sentences.en: The news of their marriage was not made public until three months later.
sentences.cn: 他们结婚的消息三个月后才公开。
她的第一次婚姻结局很不幸。

sentences.en: When will the marriage take place?

jushi.english: The two families forbade the marriage between Thompson and Nancy.
jushi.chinese: 这两家人都禁止汤姆森和南希的婚事。

jushi.english: Many women successfully mix marriage and career.
jushi.chinese: 许多女人能成功地将婚姻和事业结合起来。

jushi.english: Living separately from parents after marriage is common.
jushi.chinese: 婚后与父母分开住现在非常流行。
